result.execSummary:
All charges against Joel T Robinson in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Joel T Robinson is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Joel T Robinson in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   State's citizen witness is NOT present in court, therefore, the State is unable to proceed today.  Motion to dismiss by the defense, argued and GRANTED by the Court.  Case dismissed without prejudice.  

Note:  Court ordered any bail not previously ordered forfeited, to be returned to poster"

Defendant Joel T Robinson in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties are prepared to proceed with Jury Trial set for 03-09-2016 at 08:30 am in Branch 4.

Defendant Joel T Robinson in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case calendared for a plea hearing, however, defense requested a trial date instead. Court granted state's motion to join this case with 15CM464. Case adjourned in branch 45.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 24, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for March 9, 2016 at 08:30 am.
Bail motion by defense argued and granted by the Court.

Defendant Joel T Robinson in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Defendant Joel T Robinson in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Parties are not challenging the doctor's report. Court ordered proceedings reinstated. State reflects that the no contact ordered be modified to a "No Violent" contact order.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Pursuant to request from DHS, this matter has been rescheduled from 9/21/2015 to 9/17/2015 to comply with the 14 DAY statutory time frame to have this report addressed by the court. All parties advised. Case set for 9/17/2015 at 8:30 AM in branch 45.
Received & Filed, Fax Report from DHS.
Report from Mendota Mental Health Institute dated 09/03/2015 received and filed.
WCS FORENSIC TRACKING REPORT. FILED
Forensic Tracking report, received and filed.
Forensic Tracking Report, received and filed.
Forensic Tracking Report received and filed.

records.descr: DE not competent to stand trial, case suspended

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Joel T Robinson in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Defendant Joel T Robinson in custody.  Catelin Ringersma appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
All parties review the doctor's report.  State and Defense do not challenge the report.  The Court found defendant DOES LACK THE COMPACITY TO UNDERSTAND COURT PROCEEDINGS.  Court orders proceedings suspended.   Court ordered defendant committed to the Department of Health and Family Services for Institutional Care in order to restore competency within the statutory time frame.  The Court further found that the defendant is not competent to refuse medication for the mental condition.  Defendant is REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department for transportation to the designated facility.  Order of Commitment signed and filed.  Court orders case adjourned for Return of Doctor's Report.  Parties are notified that effective August 3, 2015 this case will be reassigned per rotation to Judge Lindsey Grady, Branch 23 in Courthouse room 515.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell in court, defendant Joel T Robinson not in court, in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant not produced.  Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed. Court ordered defendant REMANDED into custody of Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Parties are notified that effective June 8, 2015 this case will be reassigned per rotation to Reserve Judge, Branch 45 in Courthouse room 515.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for June 19, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell in court, defendant Joel T Robinson not in court, in custody.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Matter before court along with 15CM924 for plea/sentencing hearing.  Defense counsel requests an adjourned plea/sentencing date and to be heard on bail for 15CM924. Court orders case adjourned to Branch 46.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
No reply from surety/defendant.
Defendant's Bail Forfeiture Notice returned undeliverable.

Attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell in court, defendant Joel T Robinson not in court, in custody, Not produced.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 46. jks
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 05-06-2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with Rochelle S.
The court advised this is a praxis bail recommendation.

Defendant Joel T Robinson in court with attorney Brian Christopher Hagner on behalf of attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Brandon A Wigley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT. Court ordered case adjourned for scheduled conference in Branch 46 to tag along with case #15CM924 for bail-bond hearing.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued. jks

Attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel has not yet made contact with defendant, and requests time to try to get a hold of him.  Defense requests that bench warrant be stayed in this matter for at least 2 weeks.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next court date.   Court orders case adjourned for Calendar Call in Branch 46. jks  Calendar call scheduled for 03-16-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  
Defendant to have no contact with: Rochelle S. or her residence.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Joel T Robinson in court with attorney Reyna Ivonne Morales.  Defendant Joel T Robinson in custody.  Gary D. Mahkorn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Branch 46.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 25, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
